$Geraint$
Velskud?
...I don't know why you would say that name.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
A year or ten years in the past is already the past.
What you remember is what's important.

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_06.ogg}
There is a definite solution for our world....
It's so difficult to achieve.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Thank you for telling me Geraint's story.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Having heard that he is well, my mind is finally at ease. Haha.
In that sense... I'm sorry but I would like to ask you another favour.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I wasn't the only one who couldn't get out of the shadow 50 years ago.
I think she also deserves a chance.
I want you to meet Master Archer Ithilien. Please.

$Geraint$
A child with many questions.
I heard a human child has much curiosity.
You must really be a human child.

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_06.ogg}
There is a definite solution for our world...
It's so difficult to achieve.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
A year or ten years in the past is already the past.
What you remember is what's important.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
Master Archer Ithilien followed Nerwin to that battle 50 years ago.
She also lived her life with unexplained questions.
I want you to listen to that story. Please.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I heard the story from Stas. The one I've been trying to meet for a very long time is currently at the Saint Haven Royal Palace.
And... only a handful of adventurers have access to him.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
50 years ago, I accompanied Queen Narcilia to the Black Dragon Raid....
Well, she was still called Nerwin at the time.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
The troops were thought to be a coalition of humans and Elves. When a dragon appeared amongst us, we were in chaos.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
The Gold Dragon... We were so surprised when we realized that our leader, Geraint turned into a dragon.
After the war, Karacule and Barnac attacked him and said he was a traitor.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Many people died and got injured.
But Geraint disappeared with Argenta without any apology or explanation.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Lady Nerwin was injured because she was contaminated by the Black Dragon's blood, and was quickly transferred to Anu Arendel. After that, she never left Anu Arendel.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Until she left, Lady Nerwin wanted to know...
What those two were trying to do...

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Please, help me solve this aged question that has been lingering in Lady Nerwin and me.
Please ask Geraint what he has been doing up until this day.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Please give my word to Geraint.
I want to know what he has been doing for the past 50 years.

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_05.ogg}
You're going to go see Geraint per request from Master Archer Ithilien?
Hmm... The raid for the Black Dragon Karas dragged many lives for a long time.

$Geraint$
...Another person related to the incident 50 years ago?
Even when the time had passed, nobody seems to have gotten over that period.

$Geraint$
......I see. It's probably the same for me, too....
I don't think there is any being that is free from its past.

$Geraint$
After the battle 50 years ago, Velskud disappeared with the Black Dragon Jewel.
I wandered around the continent to chase Velskud, and also had to find the fragments of the Chaos Dragon and seal them.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Can you send me to the Monolith?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
After the Goddess' Dream was contaminated by poison of corruption, the world became more and more unstable. The containments spread all over the world and the monsters became stronger. I told you this before, Argenta had to use most of her powers to support the Monolith as it was becoming weaker.

$Geraint$
As I told you before, it's impossible. Monolithis a medium connecting Goddess and this world.
It is a scale measuring the world and the step toward the Goddess.
There is no way a human can withstand that kind of power.

$Geraint$
The only people that know the location are Argenta and me.... And that girl who can see the Goddess' dream.
Is that why you want to take her?

$Geraint$
I can feel your energy is different from other adventurers. Pure, but unstable....
I can feel it in your confused voice.
Do you want to get in contact with Monolith by using this girl.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then are you going to try and kill me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
What Argenta and I, and further on, Sentinel hope to protect is this world's balance.
If someone comes in contact with the Monolith, it will cause a huge shift in the balance.
I will never allow that to happen.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But I, as well, have a destiny.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Your will is yours. Your action is also yours to freely exercise.
But if you try to break the world's balance, I will try my best to eliminate you to fulfill my destiny.

$Geraint$
......I don't want to have to defeat you. All the other adventurers consider you as their colleague.
If I defeat you, then I'll become a traitor among them, too.
(Geraint's face becomes painful.)

$Geraint$
You don't have to apologize for doing what you believe in.
Now, return to Master Archer Ithilien.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I'll be listening quietly, so please, tell me his answer.
I've been thinking about that question for 50 years.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
To protect the world balance....
(Ithilien contemplates for a long time)

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I see. (Ithilien sighs quietly)
Since those two exist to protect the world, I had imagined they might have encountered some difficulty. But....

$Master Archer Ithilien$
But, was I asking too much for a dragon to understand human emotions?
I'm not talking about complicated emotion such as love or friendship.
Me, Nerwin... no, I assume everyone was thinking the same thing.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Geraint was our leader. Everyone trusted him and liked him. That's why I think Karacule and Barnac got angry when they realized who he was.
They thought he was a colleague, but have been betrayed...

$Master Archer Ithilien$
But Geraint and Argenta left without any explanation.
The ones left behind suffered from cold betrayal worse than a dreadful disease.
We thought we were used and thrown away.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
No, I won't ask anymore questions.
I feel better knowing that they lived their lives fulfilling their destiny.
They cannot go against their destiny.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I'm okay now. I've decided to blow the past away on a wind.
I also have my destiny.
(Ithilien is smiling warmly.)

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Did you hear some of the injured soldiers got a disease?
That's because they were contaminated by the Black Dragon's blood.
Although there is no cure, I want to do my best and help them.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
The same thing happened in the battle 50 years ago. I'm here remembering then....
Couln't you call this destiny?
When you have some free time, please help me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you okay if someone misunderstands or hates you?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
...Saying... that not all the questions have been answered.
You humans' lives are very short compared to that of the Elves and dragons.
But I still don't understand why you waste your time with emotions.

$Geraint$
If my colleagues consider me as a traitor, I don't have any excuses to give them.
They had suffered irrepairable injuries from the battle and I did not have the ability to cure them.

$Geraint$
Wouldn't it be better to leave and be loathed upon, since I couldn't save them?
They say, hatred is also a driving force for humans...
Someone once said that.

$Geraint$
Yes. 50 years ago, after Velskud ran away with the Black Dragon's Jewel did I realize there was someone else who was after the jewel. Velskud had infiltrated us under that order.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The revenge that he was talking about, is it to that someone else?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I don't know. I can only guess....
I don't want to disturb your future with this uncertain thing.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The future him is a good man...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
...I don't have a clue why he betrayed other colleagues.
Also, how he lived his life afterwards.
Human's strong will sometimes become a furious evilness.

$Geraint$
You always claimed you were from the future. (Geraint becomes quiet for a moment)
Even if he is your friend in the future, it doesn't change the fact that he is threatening the world this day.

$Geraint$
....
I'd never imagined he would be lenient to children.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I'm sorry. But I still have a destiny to fulfill.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
You're still a young human being. I hope you live a healthy life without thinking about the Monolith or any malice.
This is why Argenta and I are trying our best to preserve the world's balance.

$Geraint$
...I've told you too much.
Try doing something else in the bright world rather than being dragged in my past.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
You went back to Geraint?
Oh my... you're so kind.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I knew he would say that.
But at least I don't despise him. I think others feel that way, too.
(Ithilien is smiling warmly.)

$Master Archer Ithilien$
...Geraint is not a being to hate.
If he had really betrayed us, everyone would have felt more comfortable....

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_01.ogg}
I see. It's been almost 100 years from our days, but the raid on the Black Dragon Karas affected many people's lives.

$Academic Jasmine$
The Prophet is still asleep. I'm curious how the Gold Dragon's Nest will be lifted.
I don't know anything yet, and there is no record of it.... I'm getting worried.
